title: Was alright
review: In my opinion it doesn't hold up to the original TV mini series. However it is still a decent film and is much better than a lot of other horrors that Havw come out recently

title: Best film of 2018
review: Without a doubt the best film to come out the year. Was a few predictable moments but that doesn't make the film bad by any means.

title: Great movie
review: Was a brilliant movie. Had certain plot holes but overall an enjoyable film

title: Brilliant film
review: A wonderful approach to the spoof horror. As well as an accurate take on both satirical and comedy horror styles of film
